text: Conveniently located at neighbourhood heartland of Towner Road next to Northlight School Singapore Indian Association and the nostalgic Cyylon Sports Club with Colonial architecture big open fields for varieties sports facilities and breezy greenery away from busy cityscapes. Few bus stops to Novena MRT bus interchange and Boon Keng MRT NE9 near popular Bendemeer Market and Food Centre with plenty of Hawker delights. Freshly prepared food with healthy ingredients tender loving skillful cooking and warm services. Walking distance to Singapore Khalsa Association Civil Service Club Kallang Polyclinic Kwong Wai Shiu Hospital and Hawker delights at Rangoon Road including the popular Mrs Pho House Vietnamese Restaurant Ng Ah Sio Bak Kut Teh Restaurant and The Legendary Bak Kuk Teh at Ragoon. Walking distance to Hotel B1 Balestier Citadines Balestier Singapore and Quanlity Hotel Marlow and popular nostalgic Hoover Hotel used to host popular entertainment theatric evens and converted nostalgic Hotel 81 Fuji. Besides buses serving local communities there are direct buses 21 to Pasir Ris 125 to Aljunied MRT 130 to Shenton Way 139 to Bukit Merah and 145 to North Buona Vista. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students expats locals visitors and families.
